attributes.action: Ask the electorate who will be the next prime minister (no Hand over to Gordon Brown)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to ask that the Prime Minister asks the general public instead of handing over the running of this Country to a person who was not electedas Prim Minister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
